title: Bajaj plans doubling Triumph Motorcycles' output on robust bookings
description: Bajaj Auto has received over 15,000 bookings since the launch and counting. The ramp-up plans suggest that the company is striving to touch volumes of around 40,000-45,000 units in the current fiscal year and 100,000-120,000 units in the next fiscal year. This could potentially add around â‚¹800-900 crore to its revenue in the ongoing fiscal year, as per analyst estimates.
